title: Nicole & Dave
design: #content,#footer,#header p,#content p,#footer p, #header *[data-module=text],            #content *[data-module=text],            #footer *[data-module=text],            *[data-module=text_number],            *[data-module=button],            *[data-module=event_registration_form] .btn,            *[data-module=subscribe_form] .btn,            *[data-module=event_appointment_form] .btn,            *[data-module=event_reservation_form] .btn,            *[data-module=contact_form] .btn,            *[data-module=file] .btn,            #header .btn,            #content .btn,            #footer .btn,            *[data-module] .btn            { font-family: 'Karla', sans-serif!important; /* karla */}

*[data-module=title],            #header h1, #header h2, #header h3, #header h4, #header h5, #header h6,            #content h1, #content h2, #content h3, #content h4, #content h5, #content h6,            #footer h1, #footer h2, #footer h3, #footer h4, #footer h5, #footer h6            { font-family:'Karla', sans-serif!important; /* karla */ }
#content a, #content * a, #content p a, #footer a, #footer p a, body #content .ecomm-theme-link-color, body #footer .ecomm-theme-link-color  { color:#4a4747; /* #4a4747 */ }
#header .navbar-brand {font-family:'Karla', sans-serif; /* karla */ }
#header .navbar-brand {font-size:32px; } /* 32 */

#header .navbar-brand, body #content .ecomm-theme-brand-color,  body #footer .ecomm-theme-brand-color {color:#6d6a6a; } /* #6d6a6a */ body #content .ecomm-theme-brand-color-border, body #footer .ecomm-theme-brand-color-border { border-color: #6d6a6a; } [data-bm-plmi-c] .badge { background-color:#6d6a6a; } body .bm-dsm-representation .bm-dsm-rep-logo { color:#6d6a6a}

#header *[data-module=navbar] ul.nav li a, #header *[data-module=navbar] ul.navbar-nav li a,  #header *[data-module=navbar] .root:hover > ul.dropdown-menu li a  { font-family:'Karla', sans-serif; /* karla */ }
#header *[data-module=navbar] ul.nav li a, #header *[data-module=navbar] ul.navbar-nav li a, #header *[data-module=navbar] .root:hover > ul.dropdown-menu li a { font-size:16px; /* 16 */ }

#header *[data-module=navbar] ul.navbar-nav li a, #header nav.navbar ul.navbar-nav li a:not(.btn), #header *[data-module=navbar] ul.nav li a, #header *[data-module=navbar] button.navbar-toggle:before,  #header *[data-module=navbar] .root:hover > ul.dropdown-menu li a, body .bm-dsm-representation .bm-dsm-rep-menu-burger span i, html body #header li.lang-flags button.dropdown-toggle{ color:#6d6a6a; /* #6d6a6a */ }body .bm-dsm-representation .bm-dsm-rep-menu-items span.rep-menu-items, body .bm-dsm-representation .bm-dsm-rep-menu-ic-btn .bm-dsm-rep-icon, body .bm-dsm-representation .bm-dsm-rep-menu-ic-btn-unigue .bm-dsm-rep-icon-unigue, body .bm-dsm-representation .bm-dsm-rep-menu-ghost .bm-dsm-rep-menu-items-ghost span.rep-menu-items-ghost, body .bm-dsm-representation .bm-dsm-rep-menu-ghost .bm-dsm-rep-menu-ic-btn-ghost .bm-dsm-rep-icon-ghost { background-color:#6d6a6a;}#header .navbar-toggler .navbar-toggler-icon { background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf8,%3Csvg stroke='rgb(109,106,106)' viewBox='0 0 32 32' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cpath stroke-width='3' stroke-miterlimit='10' d='M4 8h24M4 16h24M4 24h24'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");  }

body,#content,#content p, *[data-module=text], #content *[data-module=text], div div *[data-module="text"] ul[class] li::before, body #content .ecomm-theme-text-color, body #footer .ecomm-theme-text-color { color:#6d6a6a; /* #6d6a6a */}

.bm-rm-item i, *[data-module=title],#content h1,#content h2,#content h3,#content h4,#content h5,#content h6, body #content .ecomm-theme-title-color, body #footer .ecomm-theme-title-color { color:#6d6a6a; /* #6d6a6a  */ }

#content,#footer,#header p,#content p,#footer p, #header *[data-module=text], #content *[data-module=text], #footer *[data-module=text], body #content .ecomm-theme-text-size, body #footer .ecomm-theme-text-size { font-size:18px; /* 18  */ }
#footer, #footer p, #footer *[data-module=text], #footer *[data-module=title] { color:#ffffff; /* #ffffff */}
